name: Shadow Depths
environment: Void mists sap mana regeneration while empowering shadow foes.

floors.name: Shadow Scout
floors.description: A swift scout of the Varyn lurking in the upper halls.

floors.name: Crystal Sentinel
floors.description: A construct empowered by Orbis crystals guarding the lower chambers.

floors.name: Depth Tyrant
floors.description: The ruler of the depths wielding ancient void magic.

name: Emerald Warren
environment: Glowing spores heal allies but enrage invading predators.

floors.name: Root-Tangled Hollow
floors.description: Twisting roots conceal guardians loyal to the grove.

floors.name: Sapling Council
floors.description: Kweebec wardens test outsiders with animated effigies.

floors.name: Wyrmroot Guardian
floors.description: A colossal bark-skinned guardian awakens to defend the heartwood.

name: Gale Spire
environment: Screaming winds knock back the unprepared but charge wind-crafted weapons.

floors.name: Cliffside Perch
floors.description: Glitterwing archers snipe intruders from wind-carved ledges.

floors.name: Resonance Hall
floors.description: Skysong choristers weave sonic shields and lightning arrays.

floors.name: Skyseer Council
floors.description: Skysong sages wield aurora energy to test your resolve.

name: Borea Stronghold
environment: Blizzard gusts slow movement but weaken fire-based attacks.

floors.name: Icebreaker Gate
floors.description: Stormguard sentries repel intruders with frost-speared ballistae.

floors.name: Stormguard Forge
floors.description: Templars wield stormforged weaponry amid roaring furnaces.

floors.name: Frostfang General
floors.description: A frostclad commander duels with electrified halberds.

name: Sunken Cathedral
environment: Tidal surges periodically flood the arena, amplifying water spells.

floors.name: Tidewatch Choir
floors.description: Siren chanters weave tides into razor hymns.

floors.name: Coral Sentinel
floors.description: Animated coral guardians lash out with living tendrils.

floors.name: Siren Matriarch
floors.description: The matriarch conducts the choir with tempestuous crescendos.

name: Emberforge Crater
environment: Molten geysers flare randomly, igniting ground tiles and empowering fire damage.

floors.name: Molten Approach
floors.description: Lava imps pelt intruders with ember shards.

floors.name: Forge Antechamber
floors.description: Elementals hammer molten ingots into living armor.

floors.name: Ashen Colossus
floors.description: A towering golem emerges from magma crucibles.

name: Howling Sands Vault
environment: Sandstorms obscure vision while charging lightning traps.

floors.name: Dune Ambush
floors.description: Sandstalkers burst from dunes with serrated blades.

floors.name: Nomad Cache
floors.description: Outlander engineers deploy traps guarding ancestral relics.

floors.name: Dune Colossus
floors.description: An awakened obelisk stomps across the vault floor.

name: Crystal Sanctuary
environment: Refraction fields reflect projectiles but magnify magical output.

floors.name: Prismatic Vestibule
floors.description: Crystalline sentries refract beams across mirrored halls.

floors.name: Lumin Scriptorium
floors.description: Archivist spirits cast lattice shields and barrier glyphs.

floors.name: Crystal Behemoth
floors.description: A radiant behemoth reshapes the arena with crystalline pillars.

name: Voidheart Citadel
environment: Corruptive auras drain health steadily unless purified with light.

floors.name: Gloom Barracks
floors.description: Shadowreavers train with spectral blades in pitch-black halls.

floors.name: Obsidian Arsenal
floors.description: Void titans imbue weapons with runic flames.

floors.name: Void Titan
floors.description: A colossal titan drenched in voidfire towers over the citadel heart.

name: Nomad Caravan Route
environment: Rolling dunes shift the battlefield every few turns.

floors.name: Mirage Patrol
floors.description: Patrol captains ride sand gliders, confusing foes with mirages.

floors.name: Caravan Forge
floors.description: Traveling smiths temper gear using portable furnaces.

floors.name: Caravan Warchief
floors.description: A veteran warchief duels with twin flameblades.

name: Tidecaller Ruins
environment: Waterlogged chambers grant swimming speed but hinder heavy armor wearers.

floors.name: Flooded Arcade
floors.description: Tidecaller myrmidons patrol the submerged hallways.

floors.name: Echoing Vault
floors.description: Resonance altars project sonic blasts across tidal waves.

floors.name: Tidecaller Champion
floors.description: A champion channels tidal surges through coral blades.

name: Wyrmroot Hollow
environment: Poisonous spores fill the air, steadily draining health unless antidotes are used.

floors.name: Sporefall Grotto
floors.description: Fungal beasts and shroom sages spew toxic clouds.

floors.name: Canopy Breach
floors.description: Vinebound titans lash out with living roots.

floors.name: Vinebound Titan
floors.description: Roots erupt as the hollow's guardian awakens.

name: Aurora Watch
environment: Aurora bursts periodically stun enemies but scramble minimaps.

floors.name: Glacial Causeway
floors.description: Aurora watchers skate across luminous ice bridges.

floors.name: Resonance Choir
floors.description: Songweavers layer protective harmonies that reflect damage.

floors.name: Aurora Avatar
floors.description: A luminous avatar channels the aurora into devastating beams.

name: Stormguard Keep
environment: Magnetized floors pull metal-clad warriors into lightning strikes.

floors.name: Thunder Rampart
floors.description: Storm aviators rain down bolts from arc towers.

floors.name: Arc Battery
floors.description: Engineers overload capacitors to unleash chain lightning.

floors.name: Stormforged Construct
floors.description: A colossal construct channels the keep's entire grid.

name: Desert Obelisk
environment: Solar flares charge the obelisk, unleashing bursts of radiant damage.

floors.name: Sunscorched Plaza
floors.description: Sunforged statues animate in blistering heat.

floors.name: Obelisk Heart
floors.description: Lightwardens rotate mirrors to focus solar beams.

floors.name: Sunforged Avatar
floors.description: A radiant avatar channels solar fire into sweeping blades.

name: Obsidian Pit
environment: Volcanic tremors periodically stun all combatants.

floors.name: Magma Cataract
floors.description: Molten streams flood the battlefield at timed intervals.

floors.name: Obsidian Crucible
floors.description: Fire giants temper weapons in volcanic forges.

floors.name: Obsidian Sentinel
floors.description: The sentinel draws power from the pit's heartfire.

name: Gale Roost
environment: Air currents periodically lift combatants into aerial skirmishes.

floors.name: Hatchling Skies
floors.description: Glitterwing hatchlings swarm intruders with razor wings.

floors.name: Ridgewind Aeries
floors.description: Harpy matriarchs shriek gusts that disarm invaders.

floors.name: Gale Roc
floors.description: The roost's monarch dives with storm-wreathed talons.

name: Frostfang Glacier
environment: Extreme cold reduces healing but slows enemy attack speed.

floors.name: Glacial Crevasse
floors.description: Frostclaw bears ambush from icy ledges.

floors.name: Icicle Cavern
floors.description: Ice elementals hurl jagged shards from vaulted ceilings.

floors.name: Frostfang Alpha
floors.description: The alpha's howl summons blizzard squalls and ice-laden claws.

name: Luminite Temple
environment: Rotating beams of pure luminite force repositioning every few turns.

floors.name: Radiant Atrium
floors.description: Luminite guardians cast prism barriers.

floors.name: Luminous Reliquary
floors.description: Archivists conjure shields and radiant lances.

floors.name: Luminite Avatar
floors.description: The avatar channels pure light into sweeping crescents.

name: Dune Sepulcher
environment: Cursed sands drain stamina unless purified relics are placed on altars.

floors.name: Silted Gallery
floors.description: Buried statues animate to defend ancient treasures.

floors.name: Buried Vault
floors.description: Ancient wardens unleash sandstorms within sealed chambers.

floors.name: Sandstone Gargoyle
floors.description: A guardian stirs, grinding the chamber with crushing wings.

name: Vinebound Vault
environment: Living vines entangle players who stand still for too long.

floors.name: Rootspun Corridor
floors.description: Animated roots lash out while glowcaps light the way.

floors.name: Bramble Reliquary
floors.description: Bramble spirits summon thorn walls and pollen clouds.

floors.name: Groveheart Warden
floors.description: The grove's guardian entwines foes with radiant vines.

name: Tempest Needle
environment: Cyclonic updrafts hurl players between sky bridges while lightning disrupts casting.

floors.name: Gale Approach
floors.description: Tempest scouts dive from the gale walls while thunder shatters footing.

floors.name: Aerial Forge
floors.description: Stormsmiths ignite anvils with lightning to empower aerial constructs.

floors.name: Tempest Warden
floors.description: An armored sentinel channels the storm eye while summoning vortex spears.

name: Molten Maw
environment: Erupting vents flood chambers with lava waves unless geomantic seals are activated.

floors.name: Lava Run
floors.description: Slag beasts burst from lavafalls while basalt plates crumble underfoot.

floors.name: Basalt Artery
floors.description: Rushing magma pulses through obsidian arteries guarded by basilisk packs.

floors.name: Ashen Colossus
floors.description: The cavern apex awakens as a titan channels rivers of fire.

name: Gloomwild Labyrinth
environment: Illusory pathways shift in twilight; lingering in glades invites fey ambushes.

floors.name: Glittering Understory
floors.description: Bioluminescent flora blinds trespassers while prowlers dart through the mist.

floors.name: Veil Market
floors.description: Fey traders barter mid-fight, offering boons while shadow dealers plot ambushes.

floors.name: Twilight Matriarch
floors.description: The matriarch bends the maze itself, cloaking the arena in dreamlight.

name: Sand Temple
environment: Ancient temple filled with wind magic and sandstorms. Wind elementals guard the inner sanctum.

floors.name: Desert Guardian
floors.description: A guardian of the temple's outer chambers, wielding sand magic.

floors.name: Wind Elemental
floors.description: A powerful wind elemental that controls the temple's storms.

floors.name: Tempest Lord
floors.description: The master of the temple, a powerful tempest lord who commands the winds.

name: Dune Sepulcher
environment: Ancient burial grounds filled with mummies and cursed treasures. The pharaoh's curse weakens all who enter.

floors.name: Mummy Guardian
floors.description: An undead guardian protecting the outer tombs.

floors.name: Sand Wraith
floors.description: A powerful wraith that haunts the inner chambers.

floors.name: Pharaoh Lich
floors.description: The ancient pharaoh, risen as a lich to guard his eternal tomb.
